content: create your own cute worry eater monster crochet pattern tutorial meet jojo the worry eater monster who loves to help kids and adults with their worries this adorable monster loves to hide under beds in wardrobes bags and even pockets especially around those who feel anxious or insecure jojo feeds on worries and helps ease the mind but be careful he tends to overeat so after feeding him a hug is needed to help him digest beginner-friendly perfect for new crocheters but fun for all levels clickable pdf navigate easily with clickable links to jump between sections step-by-step photos clear detailed instructions with pictures for easy understanding two sizes make a small 14 cm / 5 5 inches or larger 25 cm / 9 8 inches jojo pattern includes a list of materials such as 2mm and 3mm crochet hooks yarn in gray white blue and mustard yellow and fiberfill for stuffing feel free to sell your finished toys but please credit me as the designer share on social media and tag me to support my work available in english contact me with any questions i m happy to help start crocheting your worry eater today ❤️
